name: SeaArt AI
description: SeaArt AI is an AI-powered platform for creating and customizing digital artwork, videos, and characters from text or image prompts.
longDescription: SeaArt AI is a versatile AI-driven art generation platform designed to empower creators, from beginners to professionals, by transforming text or image prompts into high-quality digital artwork, videos, and characters. Launched in 2023 by STAR CLUSTER PTE. LTD., it leverages advanced machine learning, including Stable Diffusion models, to offer diverse artistic styles like anime, realistic, and abstract. The platform fosters a collaborative community where users can share creations, access tutorials, and gain inspiration. Its mission is to lower technical barriers, enabling anyone to produce stunning visuals without advanced design skills. SeaArt AI serves artists, designers, marketers, and businesses by streamlining creative workflows and providing tools for personalized content creation. It also supports enterprise solutions for high-volume art generation needs.
features: Text-to-image generation creates detailed artwork from simple text prompts, supporting styles like anime, realistic, and cartoon.
Image-to-image conversion allows users to modify existing images with new styles or enhancements for creative flexibility.
AI character creation through Cyberpub enables designing interactive AI characters with unique personalities for storytelling or engagement.
Creative upscaling enhances image resolution and quality, ideal for professional-grade prints or marketing materials.
ComfyUI integration provides advanced workflow controls for precise customization of art generation processes.
AI video generation animates static images into smooth 2D or 3D videos, perfect for dynamic content creation.
Model training lets users create custom AI models tailored to specific artistic styles or preferences.
Background removal tool isolates subjects from images, simplifying edits for presentations or creative projects.

faqs.question: What is SeaArt AI used for?
faqs.answer: SeaArt AI is used to generate and customize digital artwork, videos, and AI characters from text or image prompts, catering to artists, designers, and businesses.

faqs.question: Does SeaArt AI offer a free plan?
faqs.answer: Yes, SeaArt AI provides a free plan with 150 daily stamina credits, allowing users to explore basic features and create up to 20 images daily.

faqs.question: Can I use SeaArt AI-generated art commercially?
faqs.answer: Yes, users own the rights to their AI-generated art and can use it commercially, but must obtain authorization for using others' works.

faqs.question: What artistic styles does SeaArt AI support?
faqs.answer: SeaArt AI supports diverse styles, including anime, cartoon, photorealistic, abstract, and sci-fi, customizable to user preferences.

faqs.question: Does SeaArt AI work offline?
faqs.answer: No, SeaArt AI requires an internet connection as it processes prompts on cloud servers for efficient performance.

faqs.question: How can I improve blurry faces in SeaArt AI images?
faqs.answer: Add specific prompts like 'detailed face' or use the face restoration and upscaling tools in the editing options for sharper results.

faqs.question: What is the Cyberpub feature in SeaArt AI?
faqs.answer: Cyberpub is a chatbot feature that allows users to create and interact with AI characters, customizing their voices and personalities.
